snippet.title: Tinykin — Announcement trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist Tinykin on Steam now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1599020?utm_source=TrailerDescription&utm_medium=Youtube&utm_campaign=Announcement

Catch hundreds of tinykin and use their unique powers to bring Milo back to his home planet and back to normal size!

Follow the developers on Twitter: https://twitter.com/splashteamdevs
Or sign up to the newsletter at https://TinykinGame.com

Thanks to Andrea Asperges (https://twitter.com/PixelSword94) and Federico Bressan (https://www.instagram.com/keyn8) for their animation work on the trailer!

#Tinykin #Announcement #Trailer
